ygData.subject: Re: The D.E.D are back./Shockwave talk...
ygData.msgSnippet: Gemini Dragon roars once again as it flys over Radistor once again and then laughs as it hears Radistors excuse. Gemini Dragon: You lie. If you are a Maximal

Gemini Dragon roars once again as it flys over Radistor once again 
and then laughs as it hears Radistors excuse.

Gemini Dragon: "You lie. If you are a Maximal then you would have 
known of all of its alliances, if you are a maximal you are an 
unloyal one. For this you die now!"

With those words Gemini Dragon unleashes an energized beam of fire, 
liquid nitrogen, and electricty which ten combine to form a large and 
powerful beam of all three directed at Radistor.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Radistor knew this was coming, and actually jumped over Hot Rod and 
landed to the other side of him. Then he spun around and looked down 
at Hot Rod again.
> 
> Radistor: We were just helping out our friends in the Alliance, 
whom Radistor has aboard himself right now. We were attacking the 
Chivtrons because they have within their group a certain ex Maximal 
named Arrow. He betrayed the Maximals, and us Radicons saw it fit to 
destroy him. We had no idea you Chivtrons were allied with the 
Maximals...
> 
> ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: Legendarynemasis@a...

>   Sent: Sunday, July 15, 2001 12:25 AM

>   Gemini Dragon laughed as Radistor was set ablaze. Quickly he 
swept 
>   down towards him and unleashed two highly explosive fireballs at 
him 
>   as well as two beams of liquid nitrogen.
>
